Properties.Name: Id
Properties.Summary:
The unique identifier for the new Forum Category.
            If not specified, a random one is assigned.

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Summary:
The name for the Forum Category.
            This value is mandatory.

Properties.Name: PermissionSetId
Properties.Summary:
The unique identifier of the Permission Set used os default for all Forums within the Forum Category.
            This value is mandatory.

Properties.Name: SiteId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the Site whose the request belongs to.

Properties.Name: UserId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the User who initiated the request.

Requests.Name: CreateCategory
Requests.Summary: Request that creates a new Forum Category.

Properties.Name: Id
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the Forum Category to delete.

Properties.Name: SiteId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the Site whose the request belongs to.

Properties.Name: UserId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the User who initiated the request.

Requests.Name: DeleteCategory
Requests.Summary: Request that deletes a Forum Category.

Properties.Name: Id
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the forum category to move.

Properties.Name: Direction
Properties.Summary:
The direction.
            Can be either up or down.

Properties.Name: SiteId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the Site whose the request belongs to.

Properties.Name: UserId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the User who initiated the request.

Requests.Name: MoveCategory
Requests.Summary: Request that changes the sort order of a forum category.

Properties.Name: Id
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the forum category to update.

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Summary: The new name of the forum category.

Properties.Name: PermissionSetId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the new permission set for the forum category.

Properties.Name: SiteId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the Site whose the request belongs to.

Properties.Name: UserId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the User who initiated the request.

Requests.Name: UpdateCategory
Requests.Summary: Request that updates a forum category.

Properties.Name: Id
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the Forum Category.

Properties.Name: SiteId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the Site which the Forum Category belongs to.

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Summary: The name of the Forum Category which is displayed in the index page.

Properties.Name: SortOrder
Properties.Summary: The sort order which is used to display the Forum Categories in the index page.

Properties.Name: TopicsCount
Properties.Summary: The number of topics of all forums within the forum category.

Properties.Name: RepliesCount
Properties.Summary: The number of replies of all forums within the forum category.

Properties.Name: Status
Properties.Summary:
The status of the forum category.
            Can be either published or deleted.

Properties.Name: PermissionSetId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the Permission Set used as default for all Forums within the Forum Category which do not specify a Permission Set.

Properties.Name: Site
Properties.Summary: Reference to the Site the Forum Category belongs to.

Properties.Name: PermissionSet
Properties.Summary: Reference to Permission Set used for the Forum Category.

Properties.Name: Forums
Properties.Summary: List of Forums that belong to the Forum Category.

Methods.Name: New
Methods.Summary:
Create a new forum category with the given values including a unique identifier.
            The default Status is Published.

Methods.Name: New
Methods.Summary:
Create a new forum category with the given values.
            The unique identifier is automatically assigned.
            The default Status is Published.

Methods.Name: UpdateDetails
Methods.Summary:
Updates the details of the forum category.
            The values that can be changed are name and permission set.

Methods.Name: MoveUp
Methods.Summary:
Change the sort order by moving up 1 position.
            It generates an error if sort order is 1.

Methods.Name: MoveDown
Methods.Summary: Change the sort order by moving down 1 position.

Methods.Name: Reorder
Methods.Summary: Replace the sort order with the given value.

Methods.Name: IncreaseTopicsCount
Methods.Summary:
Increase the number of topics by the given value.
            If no value is given it will increase by 1.

Methods.Name: IncreaseRepliesCount
Methods.Summary:
Increase the number of replies by the given value.
            If no value is given it will increase by 1.

Methods.Name: DecreaseTopicsCount
Methods.Summary:
Decrease the number of topics by the given value.
            If no value is given it will decrease by 1.
            If the resulting number is less than zero, the value will be set to zero.

Methods.Name: DecreaseRepliesCount
Methods.Summary:
Decrease the number of replies by the given value.
            If no value is given it will decrease by 1.
            If the resulting number is less than zero, the value will be set to zero.

Methods.Name: Delete
Methods.Summary:
Set the status as deleted.
            Forums, topics and replies within the forum category will no longer be visible.

Methods.Name: PermissionSetName
Methods.Summary: Returns the name of permission set used.

Properties.Name: Id
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier for the new forum. If not specified, a random one is assigned.

Properties.Name: CategoryId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the forum category which the new forum belongs to.

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Summary: The name of the new forum.

Properties.Name: Slug
Properties.Summary: The slug for the new forum.

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Summary: The description of the new forum.

Properties.Name: PermissionSetId
Properties.Summary:
The unique identifier of the permission set.
            If not assigned, the new forum will inherit the permission set from the forum category.

Properties.Name: SiteId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the Site whose the request belongs to.

Properties.Name: UserId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the User who initiated the request.

Requests.Name: CreateForum
Requests.Summary: Request that creates a forum section.

Properties.Name: Id
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the forum to delete.

Properties.Name: SiteId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the Site whose the request belongs to.

Properties.Name: UserId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the User who initiated the request.

Properties.Name: Id
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the forum to move.

Properties.Name: Direction
Properties.Summary:
The direction.
            Can be either up or down.

Properties.Name: SiteId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the Site whose the request belongs to.

Properties.Name: UserId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the User who initiated the request.

Requests.Name: MoveForum
Requests.Summary: Request that changes the sort order of a forum.

Properties.Name: Id
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the forum to update.

Properties.Name: CategoryId
Properties.Summary: The new forum category for the forum.

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Summary: The new name of the forum.

Properties.Name: Slug
Properties.Summary: The new slug of the forum.

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Summary: The new description of the forum.

Properties.Name: PermissionSetId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the new permission set for the forum.

Properties.Name: SiteId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the Site whose the request belongs to.

Properties.Name: UserId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the User who initiated the request.

Requests.Name: UpdateForum
Requests.Summary: Request that updates the forum details.

Properties.Name: Id
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the Forum.

Properties.Name: CategoryId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the Forum Category which the Forum belongs to.

Properties.Name: Slug
Properties.Summary:
The Slug of the Forum.
            This value is added to the URL in order to identify the Forum.
            If the Slug is "my-forum-slug", the URL will be something similar to "www.mysite.com/forum/my-forum-slug".

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Summary:
The description of the Forum.
            This value will be displayed in the index and forum pages if included in the theme.

Properties.Name: SortOrder
Properties.Summary: The sort order which is used to display the forums in the index page.

Properties.Name: Status
Properties.Summary:
The status of the forum.
            Can be either published or deleted.

Properties.Name: PermissionSetId
Properties.Summary:
The unique identifier of the permission set used.
            If it's not assigned, the forum will inherit the permission set fom the forum category.

Properties.Name: LastPostId
Properties.Summary: The unique identifier of the last post published.

Properties.Name: PermissionSet
Properties.Summary: Reference to the permission set if assigned.

Properties.Name: LastPost
Properties.Summary: Reference to the last post published if any.

Methods.Name: UpdateDetails
Methods.Summary:
Updates the details of the forum.
            The values that can be changed are forum category, name, slug, description and permission set.

Methods.Name: UpdateLastPost
Methods.Summary: Updates the unique identifier of the last published post.

Methods.Name: MoveUp
Methods.Summary:
Change the sort order by moving up 1 position.
            It generates an error if sort order is 1.

Methods.Name: MoveDown
Methods.Summary: Change the sort order by moving down 1 position.

Methods.Name: Reorder
Methods.Summary: Replace the sort order with the given value.

Methods.Name: IncreaseTopicsCount
Methods.Summary: Increase the number of topics by 1.

Methods.Name: DecreaseTopicsCount
Methods.Summary:
Decrease the number of topics by 1.
            If the resulting number is less than zero, the value will be set to zero.

Methods.Name: IncreaseRepliesCount
Methods.Summary: Increase the number of replies by 1.

Methods.Name: DecreaseRepliesCount
Methods.Summary:
Decrease the number of replies by 1.
            If the resulting number is less than zero, the value will be set to zero.

Methods.Name: Delete
Methods.Summary:
Set the status as deleted.
            Topics and replies within the forum will no longer be visible.

Methods.Name: PermissionSetName
Methods.Summary: Returns the name of permission set if assigned.

Methods.Name: HasPermissionSet
Methods.Summary: Indicates if a permission set is assigned.
